headline.main: Tyrese Tops Billboard Chart With ‘Black Rose’

docs.snippet: The film “Furious 7″ is not only a box-office hit but is also dominating the music charts again: One of the film’s stars, Tyrese Gibson, has the No. 1 album....
docs.abstract: The film “Furious 7″ is not only a box-office hit but is also dominating the music charts again: One of the film’s stars, Tyrese Gibson, has the No. 1 album.

headline.main: Country Singers Blake Shelton and Miranda Lambert Announce Divorce

docs.lead_paragraph: Country music superstars Blake Shelton and Miranda Lambert said on Monday they have divorced after four years of marriage.

headline.main: Ex-Washington State NAACP Leader Dolezal: 'I Would Say I'm Black'
headline.print_headline: Ex-Washington State NAACP Leader Dolezal: 'I Would Say I'm Black'

docs.snippet: A civil rights activist who drew national attention for self-identifying as a black woman despite being the child of white parents, told magazine Vanity Fair she did not lie, but her critics are limited by their views of race: "I would say I'm bla...
docs.lead_paragraph: A civil rights activist who drew national attention for self-identifying as a black woman despite being the child of white parents, told magazine Vanity Fair she did not lie, but her critics are limited by their views of race: "I would say I'm black."

headline.main: Police: Ex-NFL Player's Mistress Kills His Wife Then Self
headline.print_headline: Police: Ex-NFL Player's Mistress Kills His Wife Then Self

docs.snippet: A former NFL player's mistress, apparently jealous that he was taking his wife on a trip to Las Vegas, drove to his home near Atlanta, kidnapped her romantic rival and led officers on a chase into Alabama before killing the wife and herself, polic...
docs.lead_paragraph: A former NFL player's mistress, apparently jealous that he was taking his wife on a trip to Las Vegas, drove to his home near Atlanta, kidnapped her romantic rival and led officers on a chase into Alabama before killing the wife and herself, police said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Garrison Keillor, creator and longtime host of the popular "A Prairie Home Companion" radio show, says he means it this time: He's retiring.

headline.main: Thousands of Athletes Prepare for Special Olympics This Week
